Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.22 Hetuduka, Sanidassanasappaṭighattika » 1.22.2 Anidassanaappaṭighapada » 1.22.2.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Sanidassanasappaṭighattika
Anidassanaappaṭighapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
545.
1220Hetuṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
1221Nahetuṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
1222Hetuṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca nahetuṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
546.
1223Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava…pe…  kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Paccayacatukkaup Nahetu-naadhipati >>
